summary: Shield charge is like unrelenting force, except thereâ€™s no cooldown. This mod aims to make the perk slightly more balanced.
descriptionHtml:
Shield charge sends your enemies flying through the air, but only costs slightly more stamina than sprinting.

This mod increases stamina consumption of shield charging to ~50 points per seconds. Furthermore, shield charge now consumes bit of magicka as well. Sending people flying through the air without losing momentum is a magic.


---------------------------------
This mod simply increases stamina & magicka consumption of shield charge. It does not alter any other effect, nor fixes bugs associated with the perk.
author: Askeladden
